alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 4:04AM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000 Feet, Wet Mountains Above 10000 Feet, and Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For Pueblo County, the very strong winds will develop over western and southern parts of the county tonight, and then spread across the remainder of the county on Sunday.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
